txt.en: The books are safe for the moment, but the forces here will likely attempt to destroy them again if they are allowed the opportunity.

The School at Tham Mirdaín was renowned for its knowledge and learning.\n\nThe forces here have learned all they can and are now burning the books to keep the information from the hands of the Free Peoples. The books must be saved.
The books here are being burned...they must be saved
The bookstands have been burned beyond saving.
The greatest of the school's knowledge is kept within the north annex.

The School at Tham Mirdaín did not contain much of the knowledge that the library did, but there were several tomes of great import.\n\nThe forces here have learned all they can and are now burning the books to keep the information from the hands of the Free Peoples. The books must be saved.
